creator.name: Raden Commissarissen tot het houden der dingtalen
creator.name_english: Councillors-commissioners entrusted with the facilitation of judicial procedures
creator.his_func: According to the regulation of the Grand Council of Curaçao of 1740, two Councillors were commissioned to prepare and facilitate judicial procedures. At the request of the fiscal (Public Prosecutor), they interrogated suspects and witnesses. Barristers and attorneys of the litigating parties had to address themselves to the commissioners. In addition, the commissioners attended to requests of persons who wished to be admitted as brokers and who objected to imposed poll taxes.
